原始数据.标题: Lotus Health nabs $35M for AI doctor that sees patients for free
原始数据.内容: This AI doctor is licensed in all 50 states, the startup says. The deal was led by CRV and Kleiner Perkins.

原始数据.标题: Fitbit founders launch AI platform to help families monitor their health
